Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Penn in 1969...
Injured on 6/20/1969 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/14/1969 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 4/5/1970 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/1/1970 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 7/24/1971 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/1/1971 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/6/1972 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 9/25/1972, off Claud Noble (CC)...
Earned first career win on 5/17/1973...
Injured on 4/5/1974 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won World Championship with Penn in 1974...
Traded from Penn to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1975 (Going to PEN: 1B J. Green. Going to PIL: P R. Stiff, C C. Maddux, SS W. Thompson)...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/15/1977 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/15/1984 to a 2-year deal worth $10,250,000 per year...
Injured on 4/30/1984 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/4/1986 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 6-7 weeks...
